documentation.text: @notice The basket manager contract which interacts with basket core to mint and redeem basket tokens.
@dev Initializes the contract in the proxy.
@dev Adds a new underlying token to the basket.
@dev Pause the underlying asset. It's balance cannot increase in the BasketCore.
@dev Unpause the underlying asset. It's balance can increase in the BasketCore.
@dev Terminates an asset. It's balance can increase in the BasketCore, and it's a final status.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "BasketManager: Basket core is not set"

arguments.value: BasketManager: Basket core is not set

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BasketManager: Basket core is not set"

documentation.text: @dev Updates the BasketCore contract.
@dev Retrieves the BasketCore contract address.
@notice The basket manager contract which interacts with basket core to mint and redeem basket tokens.
@dev Initializes the contract in the proxy.
@dev Adds a new underlying token to the basket.
@dev Pause the underlying asset. It's balance cannot increase in the BasketCore.
@dev Unpause the underlying asset. It's balance can increase in the BasketCore.
@dev Terminates an asset. It's balance can increase in the BasketCore, and it's a final status.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "BasketManager: Basket core is not set"

arguments.value: BasketManager: Basket core is not set

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BasketManager: Basket core is not set"

documentation.text: @dev Updates the BasketCore contract.
@dev Retrieves the BasketCore contract address.

addAsset(address).details: Adds a new underlying token to the basket.

initialize().details: Initializes the contract in the proxy.

params.amounts: The amounts of underlying assets deposited.
params.sourceAddress: The address of the user who mints new basket tokens.
params.tokenAddresses: The addresses of the underlying assets deposited.

returns._0: The amount of basket token minted.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pauseAsset(address).details: Pause the underlying asset. It's balance cannot increase in the BasketCore.

params.amount: The amount of basket token to redeem.
params.sourceAddress: The address of the user who redeems existing basket tokens.

returns.tokenAddresses: The underlying assets and their amounts withdrawn.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

terminateAsset(address).details: Terminates an asset. It's balance can increase in the BasketCore, and it's a final status.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpauseAsset(address).details: Unpause the underlying asset. It's balance can increase in the BasketCore.

userdoc.notice: The basket manager contract which interacts with basket core to mint and redeem basket tokens.
